entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 early this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
